name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John F. LEARN, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and ZAPPALA, J., dissent.

casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 161
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John F. LEARN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 29, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
Reargument Denied Nov. 30, 1989.
Bruce L. Getsinger, Cranberry, for appellant.
William R. Cunningham, Dist. Atty., James K. Vogel, Asst. Dist. Atty., E.J. DiSantis, Jr., First Asst. Dist. Atty., James Blackwood, Office of the Dist. Atty., Erie, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
